name: Jerald the Crazy Fox
description:
The game is simple, you can walk around freely.

You have to get closer to explosion and you get more points.

But watch out because if you to close you can lose.

Let me now in the comment, how long did you last, and Share your ideas.

This game is my first Unity game, It's a little bit all over the place, but I hope you find something happy and fun in it.

Jerald the fox is a really special fox, had some bad times, but now he crazy.

Crazier then ever.

Instructions:

Arrow keys - Movement

Up arrow - Jump
